title: Raz
description: Unseen by those who don't believe in magic, seventeen year old Raz lives in a future place called Society. One day he finds a girl, Awena, who is able to see him. Little does he know that her father is the one who made him invisible in the first place and is now trying to rid him of the three powers that he the ability to fly, run up to three hundred miles per hour, and hold his breath for hours without end. Together, Raz and Awena try to discover where Raz's real family is by going outside of Society to the Land of Unknown. Full of adventure and conflict, Raz is a great novel for teens and young adults.
author: Anna Jean Ouellette
